item.name: Right shift key hack.
item.appendix: * Use the right Shift key as usual.
* Press Shift, then Arrow (up/down) for "Begin of Document"/"End of Document".
* Press Shift, then Shift+Arrow for "Select to Beginning of line" / "Select to End of line".
